definition: diamond/(used to translate Sanskrit "vajra", a thunderbolt or mythical weapon)/guardian deity (in Buddhist iconography)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]
to have a face as terrifying as a temple's guardian deity (idiom)
see 丈二和尚，摸不著頭腦|丈二和尚，摸不着头脑[zhang4 er4 he2 shang5 , mo1 bu5 zhao2 tou2 nao3]

definition: Kumgangsan Tourist Region in east North Korea
Bodhimanda (place of enlightenment associated with a Bodhisattva)

sentences.english: The body of the Tathagata is adamantine and indestructible.
sentences.chinese: 如来的身体是金刚体，牢不可破。

sentences.english: There are only four regions in the world where huge reserves of diamond are found.
sentences.chinese: 世界上只有四个地区被人发现有大量金刚石。

sentences.english: Shape the nail, using a file or emery board .
sentences.chinese: 塑造钉子，使用一个文件或金刚砂董事会。

sentences.english: Objective To determine diosgenin content in Jingangteng soft capsule by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金刚藤软胶囊中薯蓣皂苷元的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: There's a temple in the middle of Hanoi.
sentences.chinese: 在这个寺庙内有三个非常大的金刚石柱子。

sentences.english: And yet pure iron is scarcer than gold or diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 然而纯铁比黄金或金刚石还罕见。

sentences.english: In this paper analysis is made on the defects of present diamond dry cutting wheels.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了目前风冷式金刚石干切片存在的缺陷。

sentences.english: All other metals and nonmetals lie within the boundaries of lead and diamond.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他金属和非金属都处在铅和金刚石的界限之内。

sentences.english: It can be predicted that water-based nano-diamond polishing slurry will gain more attention and applications.
sentences.chinese: 水基纳米金刚石抛光液可能是未来抛光液的发展方向。

sentences.english: Electroplating process in holes is a new technique for precise diamond reamer manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 内镀工艺是一种新的精密金刚石铰刀的制造方法。

sentences.english: The use of boring machine can be better to complete the processing of the small connecting rod.
sentences.chinese: 利用金刚镗床可以较好的完成小连杆的加工。

sentences.english: Virtual indestructibility was just one of the many perks I was looking forward to.
sentences.chinese: 金刚不坏之身只是我期许的诸多好处之一。

sentences.english: A couple point out sites on massive map along a wall in Mount Kumgang resort.
sentences.chinese: 一对姐妹在金刚山景区巨幅地图前找位置。

sentences.english: Meditation is equal to gaza palletizer vajrayana meditation all buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 禅修金刚萨垛即等于禅修一切诸佛。

sentences.english: This process eventually leads to nano-crystalline diamond structures.
sentences.chinese: 最后，这种方法会形成纳米晶金刚石结构。

sentences.english: AIM:To study the chemical constituents of Euphorbia antiquorum L.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究金刚纂的化学成分。
